name: Fox Hollow
description:
This was a very simple game made for Winter Game Jam 2022!

Our team had 2 weeks to make it, and we did the best we could within that time frame. There will be bugs, that's to be expected but we ran out of time before we could make it work perfectly.

We hope you enjoy!

Credits:

Isaac D. - Programmer / Artist

Nutpapop Yasawut - Lead Programmer

Garrett Rose - Composer / Music
